name: Buck
text: ya`^>ay~uhaA {l~a*iyna 'aAmanuw^A@ >awofuwA@ bi{loEuquwdi >uHil~ato lakum bahiymapu {lo>anoEa`mi <il~aA maA yutolaY` Ealayokumo gayora muHil~iY {lS~ayodi wa>antumo HurumN <in~a {ll~aha yaHokumu maA yuriydu

name: Buck
text: ya`^>ay~uhaA {l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ laA tuHil~uwA@ $aEa`^}ira {ll~ahi walaA {l$~ahora {loHaraAma walaA {lohadoYa walaA {loqala`^}ida walaA^ 'aA^m~iyna {lobayota {loHaraAma yabotaguwna faDolFA m~in r~ab~ihimo wariDowa`nFA wa<i*aA Halalotumo fa{SoTaAduwA@ walaA yajoriman~akumo $ana_#aAnu qawomK >an Sad~uwkumo Eani {lomasojidi {loHaraAmi >an taEotaduwA@ wataEaAwanuwA@ EalaY {lobir~i wa{lt~aqowaY` walaA taEaAwanuwA@ EalaY {lo<ivomi wa{loEudowa`ni wa{t~aquwA@ {ll~aha <in~a {ll~aha $adiydu {loEiqaAbi

text: Hur~imato Ealayokumu {lomayotapu wa{ld~amu walaHomu {loxinziyri wamaA^ >uhil~a ligayori {ll~ahi bihi. wa{lomunoxaniqapu wa{lomawoquw*apu wa{lomutarad~iyapu wa{ln~aTiyHapu wamaA^ >akala {ls~abuEu <il~aA maA *ak~ayotumo wamaA *ubiHa EalaY {ln~uSubi wa>an tasotaqosimuwA@ bi{lo>azola`mi *a`likumo fisoqN {loyawoma ya}isa {l~a*iyna kafaruwA@ min diynikumo falaA taxo$awohumo wa{xo$awoni {loyawoma >akomalotu lakumo diynakumo wa>atomamotu Ealayokumo niEomatiY waraDiytu lakumu {lo<isola`ma diynFA famani {DoTur~a fiY maxomaSapK gayora mutajaAnifK l~i<ivomK fa<in~a {ll~aha gafuwrN r~aHiymN

text: yaso_#aluwnaka maA*aA^ >uHil~a lahumo qulo >uHil~a lakumu {lT~ay~iba`tu wamaA Eal~amotum m~ina {lojawaAriHi mukal~ibiyna tuEal~imuwnahun~a mim~aA Eal~amakumu {ll~ahu fakuluwA@ mim~aA^ >amosakona Ealayokumo wa{*okuruwA@ {soma {ll~ahi Ealayohi wa{t~aquwA@ {ll~aha <in~a {ll~aha sariyEu {loHisaAbi

text: {loyawoma >uHil~a lakumu {lT~ay~iba`tu waTaEaAmu {l~a*iyna >uwtuwA@ {lokita`ba Hil~N l~akumo waTaEaAmukumo Hil~N l~ahumo wa{lomuHoSana`tu mina {lomu&omina`ti wa{lomuHoSana`tu mina {l~a*iyna >uwtuwA@ {lokita`ba min qabolikumo <i*aA^ 'aAtayotumuwhun~a >ujuwrahun~a muHoSiniyna gayora musa`fiHiyna walaA mut~axi*iY^ >axodaAnK waman yakofuro bi{lo<iyma`ni faqado HabiTa Eamaluhu, wahuwa fiY {lo'aAxirapi mina {loxa`siriyna

name: Buck
text: ya`^>ay~uhaA {l~a*iyna 'aAmanuw^A@ <i*aA qumotumo <ilaY {lS~alaw`pi fa{gosiluwA@ wujuwhakumo wa>ayodiyakumo <ilaY {lomaraAfiqi wa{mosaHuwA@ biru'uwsikumo wa>arojulakumo <ilaY {lokaEobayoni wa<in kuntumo junubFA fa{T~ah~aruwA@ wa<in kuntum m~aroDaY`^ >awo EalaY` safarK >awo jaA^'a >aHadN m~inkum m~ina {logaA^}iTi >awo la`masotumu {ln~isaA^'a falamo tajiduwA@ maA^'F fatayam~amuwA@ SaEiydFA Tay~ibFA fa{mosaHuwA@ biwujuwhikumo wa>ayodiykum m~inohu maA yuriydu {ll~ahu liyajoEala Ealayokum m~ino HarajK wala`kin yuriydu liyuTah~irakumo waliyutim~a niEomatahu, Ealayokumo laEal~akumo ta$okuruwna

name: Buck
text: wa{*okuruwA@ niEomapa {ll~ahi Ealayokumo wamiyva`qahu {l~a*iY waAvaqakum bihi.^ <i*o qulotumo samiEonaA wa>aTaEonaA wa{t~aquwA@ {ll~aha <in~a {ll~aha EaliymN[ bi*aAti {lS~uduwri

name: Buck
text: ya`^>ay~uhaA {l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ kuwnuwA@ qaw~a`miyna lil~ahi $uhadaA^'a bi{loqisoTi walaA yajoriman~akumo $ana_#aAnu qawomK EalaY`^ >al~aA taEodiluwA@ {EodiluwA@ huwa >aqorabu lilt~aqowaY` wa{t~aquwA@ {ll~aha <in~a {ll~aha xabiyrN[ bimaA taEomaluwna

text: waEada {ll~ahu {l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ waEamiluwA@ {lS~a`liHa`ti lahum m~agofirapN wa>ajorN EaZiymN

text: wa{l~a*iyna kafaruwA@ waka*~abuwA@ bi_#aAya`tinaA^ >uw@la`^}ika >aSoHa`bu {lojaHiymi

text: ya`^>ay~uhaA {l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ {*okuruwA@ niEomata {ll~ahi Ealayokumo <i*o ham~a qawomN >an yabosuTuw^A@ <ilayokumo >ayodiyahumo fakaf~a >ayodiyahumo Eankumo wa{t~aquwA@ {ll~aha waEalaY {ll~ahi faloyatawak~ali {lomu&ominuwna

text: walaqado >axa*a {ll~ahu miyva`qa baniY^ <isora`^'iyla wabaEavonaA minohumu {vonaYo Ea$ara naqiybFA waqaAla {ll~ahu <in~iY maEakumo la}ino >aqamotumu {lS~alaw`pa wa'aAtayotumu {lz~akaw`pa wa'aAmantum birusuliY waEaz~arotumuwhumo wa>aqoraDotumu {ll~aha qaroDFA HasanFA l~a>ukaf~iran~a Eankumo say~i_#aAtikumo wala>udoxilan~akumo jan~a`tK tajoriY min taHotihaA {lo>anoha`ru faman kafara baEoda *a`lika minkumo faqado Dal~a sawaA^'a {ls~abiyli

name: Buck
text: fabimaA naqoDihim m~iyva`qahumo laEan~a`humo wajaEalonaA quluwbahumo qa`siyapF yuHar~ifuwna {lokalima Ean m~awaADiEihi. wanasuwA@ HaZ~FA m~im~aA *uk~iruwA@ bihi. walaA tazaAlu taT~aliEu EalaY` xaA^}inapK m~inohumo <il~aA qaliylFA m~inohumo fa{Eofu Eanohumo wa{SofaHo <in~a {ll~aha yuHib~u {lomuHosiniyna

name: Buck
text: wamina {l~a*iyna qaAluw^A@ <in~aA naSa`raY`^ >axa*onaA miyva`qahumo fanasuwA@ HaZ~FA m~im~aA *uk~iruwA@ bihi. fa>agorayonaA bayonahumu {loEadaAwapa wa{lobagoDaA^'a <ilaY` yawomi {loqiya`mapi wasawofa yunab~i}uhumu {ll~ahu bimaA kaAnuwA@ yaSonaEuwna

text: ya`^>ahola {lokita`bi qado jaA^'akumo rasuwlunaA yubay~inu lakumo kaviyrFA m~im~aA kuntumo tuxofuwna mina {lokita`bi wayaEofuwA@ Ean kaviyrK qado jaA^'akum m~ina {ll~ahi nuwrN wakita`bN m~ubiynN

text: yahodiY bihi {ll~ahu mani {t~abaEa riDowa`nahu, subula {ls~ala`mi wayuxorijuhum m~ina {lZ~uluma`ti <ilaY {ln~uwri bi<i*onihi. wayahodiyhimo <ilaY` Sira`TK m~usotaqiymK

name: Buck
text: l~aqado kafara {l~a*iyna qaAluw^A@ <in~a {ll~aha huwa {lomasiyHu {bonu maroyama qulo faman yamoliku mina {ll~ahi $ayo_#FA <ino >araAda >an yuholika {lomasiyHa {bona maroyama wa>um~ahu, waman fiY {lo>aroDi jamiyEFA walil~ahi muloku {ls~ama`wa`ti wa{lo>aroDi wamaA bayonahumaA yaxoluqu maA ya$aA^'u wa{ll~ahu EalaY` kul~i $aYo'K qadiyrN

name: Buck
text: waqaAlati {loyahuwdu wa{ln~aSa`raY` naHonu >abona`^&uA@ {ll~ahi wa>aHib~a`^&uhu, qulo falima yuEa*~ibukum bi*unuwbikum balo >antum ba$arN m~im~ano xalaqa yagofiru liman ya$aA^'u wayuEa*~ibu man ya$aA^'u walil~ahi muloku {ls~ama`wa`ti wa{lo>aroDi wamaA bayonahumaA wa<ilayohi {lomaSiyru

name: Buck
text: ya`^>ahola {lokita`bi qado jaA^'akumo rasuwlunaA yubay~inu lakumo EalaY` fatorapK m~ina {lr~usuli >an taquwluwA@ maA jaA^'anaA min[ ba$iyrK walaA na*iyrK faqado jaA^'akum ba$iyrN wana*iyrN wa{ll~ahu EalaY` kul~i $aYo'K qadiyrN

name: Buck
text: wa<i*o qaAla muwsaY` liqawomihi. ya`qawomi {*okuruwA@ niEomapa {ll~ahi Ealayokumo <i*o jaEala fiykumo >an[biyaA^'a wajaEalakum m~uluwkFA wa'aAtaY`kum m~aA lamo yu&oti >aHadFA m~ina {loEa`lamiyna

name: Buck
text: ya`qawomi {doxuluwA@ {lo>aroDa {lomuqad~asapa {l~atiY kataba {ll~ahu lakumo walaA tarotad~uwA@ EalaY`^ >adobaArikumo fatanqalibuwA@ xa`siriyna

name: Buck
text: qaAluwA@ ya`muwsaY`^ <in~a fiyhaA qawomFA jab~aAriyna wa<in~aA lan n~adoxulahaA Hat~aY` yaxorujuwA@ minohaA fa<in yaxorujuwA@ minohaA fa<in~aA da`xiluwna

text: qaAla rajulaAni mina {l~a*iyna yaxaAfuwna >anoEama {ll~ahu EalayohimaA {doxuluwA@ Ealayohimu {lobaAba fa<i*aA daxalotumuwhu fa<in~akumo ga`libuwna waEalaY {ll~ahi fatawak~aluw^A@ <in kuntum m~u&ominiyna

name: Buck
text: qaAluwA@ ya`muwsaY`^ <in~aA lan n~adoxulahaA^ >abadFA m~aA daAmuwA@ fiyhaA fa{*ohabo >anta warab~uka faqa`tilaA^ <in~aA ha`hunaA qa`Eiduwna

text: qaAla rab~i <in~iY laA^ >amoliku <il~aA nafosiY wa>axiY fa{foruqo bayonanaA wabayona {loqawomi {lofa`siqiyna

text: qaAla fa<in~ahaA muHar~amapN Ealayohimo >arobaEiyna sanapF yatiyhuwna fiY {lo>aroDi falaA ta>osa EalaY {loqawomi {lofa`siqiyna

text: wa{tolu Ealayohimo naba>a {bonaYo 'aAdama bi{loHaq~i <i*o qar~abaA qurobaAnFA fatuqub~ila mino >aHadihimaA walamo yutaqab~alo mina {lo'aAxari qaAla la>aqotulan~aka qaAla <in~amaA yataqab~alu {ll~ahu mina {lomut~aqiyna

text: la}in[ basaTta <ilaY~a yadaka litaqotulaniY maA^ >anaA" bibaAsiTK yadiYa <ilayoka li>aqotulaka <in~iY^ >axaAfu {ll~aha rab~a {loEa`lamiyna

text: <in~iY^ >uriydu >an tabuw^>a bi<ivomiY wa<ivomika fatakuwna mino >aSoHa`bi {ln~aAri wa*a`lika jaza`^&uA@ {lZ~a`limiyna

text: faTaw~aEato lahu, nafosuhu, qatola >axiyhi faqatalahu, fa>aSobaHa mina {loxa`siriyna

text: mino >ajoli *a`lika katabonaA EalaY` baniY^ <isora`^'iyla >an~ahu, man qatala nafosF[A bigayori nafosK >awo fasaAdK fiY {lo>aroDi faka>an~amaA qatala {ln~aAsa jamiyEFA wamano >aHoyaAhaA faka>an~amaA^ >aHoyaA {ln~aAsa jamiyEFA walaqado jaA^'atohumo rusulunaA bi{lobay~ina`ti vum~a <in~a kaviyrFA m~inohum baEoda *a`lika fiY {lo>aroDi lamusorifuwna

text: <in~amaA jaza`^&uA@ {l~a*iyna yuHaAribuwna {ll~aha warasuwlahu, wayasoEawona fiY {lo>aroDi fasaAdFA >an yuqat~aluw^A@ >awo yuSal~abuw^A@ >awo tuqaT~aEa >ayodiyhimo wa>arojuluhum m~ino xila`fK >awo yunfawoA@ mina {lo>aroDi *a`lika lahumo xizoYN fiY {ld~unoyaA walahumo fiY {lo'aAxirapi Ea*aAbN EaZiymN

text: yuriyduwna >an yaxorujuwA@ mina {ln~aAri wamaA hum bixa`rijiyna minohaA walahumo Ea*aAbN m~uqiymN

text: wa{ls~aAriqu wa{ls~aAriqapu fa{qoTaEuw^A@ >ayodiyahumaA jazaA^'F[ bimaA kasabaA naka`lFA m~ina {ll~ahi wa{ll~ahu EaziyzN HakiymN

text: faman taAba min[ baEodi Zulomihi. wa>aSolaHa fa<in~a {ll~aha yatuwbu Ealayohi <in~a {ll~aha gafuwrN r~aHiymN

text: >alamo taEolamo >an~a {ll~aha lahu, muloku {ls~ama`wa`ti wa{lo>aroDi yuEa*~ibu man ya$aA^'u wayagofiru liman ya$aA^'u wa{ll~ahu EalaY` kul~i $aYo'K qadiyrN

name: Buck
text: ya`^>ay~uhaA {lr~asuwlu laA yaHozunka {l~a*iyna yusa`riEuwna fiY {lokufori mina {l~a*iyna qaAluw^A@ 'aAman~aA bi>afowa`hihimo walamo tu&omin quluwbuhumo wamina {l~a*iyna haAduwA@ sam~a`Euwna liloka*ibi sam~a`Euwna liqawomK 'aAxariyna lamo ya>otuwka yuHar~ifuwna {lokalima min[ baEodi mawaADiEihi. yaquwluwna <ino >uwtiytumo ha`*aA faxu*uwhu wa<in l~amo tu&otawohu fa{Ho*aruwA@ waman yuridi {ll~ahu fitonatahu, falan tamolika lahu, mina {ll~ahi $ayo_#FA >uw@la`^}ika {l~a*iyna lamo yuridi {ll~ahu >an yuTah~ira quluwbahumo lahumo fiY {ld~unoyaA xizoYN walahumo fiY {lo'aAxirapi Ea*aAbN EaZiymN

text: sam~a`Euwna liloka*ibi >ak~a`luwna lils~uHoti fa<in jaA^'uwka fa{Hokum bayonahumo >awo >aEoriDo Eanohumo wa<in tuEoriDo Eanohumo falan yaDur~uwka $ayo_#FA wa<ino Hakamota fa{Hokum bayonahum bi{loqisoTi <in~a {ll~aha yuHib~u {lomuqosiTiyna

name: Buck
text: <in~aA^ >anzalonaA {lt~aworaY`pa fiyhaA hudFY wanuwrN yaHokumu bihaA {ln~abiy~uwna {l~a*iyna >asolamuwA@ lil~a*iyna haAduwA@ wa{lr~ab~a`niy~uwna wa{lo>aHobaAru bimaA {sotuHofiZuwA@ min kita`bi {ll~ahi wakaAnuwA@ Ealayohi $uhadaA^'a falaA taxo$awuA@ {ln~aAsa wa{xo$awoni walaA ta$otaruwA@ bi_#aAya`tiY vamanFA qaliylFA waman l~amo yaHokum bimaA^ >anzala {ll~ahu fa>uw@la`^}ika humu {loka`firuwna

name: Buck
text: wakatabonaA Ealayohimo fiyhaA^ >an~a {ln~afosa bi{ln~afosi wa{loEayona bi{loEayoni wa{lo>anfa bi{lo>anfi wa{lo>u*una bi{lo>u*uni wa{ls~in~a bi{ls~in~i wa{lojuruwHa qiSaASN faman taSad~aqa bihi. fahuwa kaf~aArapN l~ahu, waman l~amo yaHokum bimaA^ >anzala {ll~ahu fa>uw@la`^}ika humu {lZ~a`limuwna

name: Buck
text: waqaf~ayonaA EalaY`^ 'aAva`rihim biEiysaY {boni maroyama muSad~iqFA l~imaA bayona yadayohi mina {lt~aworaY`pi wa'aAtayona`hu {lo<injiyla fiyhi hudFY wanuwrN wamuSad~iqFA l~imaA bayona yadayohi mina {lt~aworaY`pi wahudFY wamawoEiZapF l~ilomut~aqiyna

text: waloyaHokumo >aholu {lo<injiyli bimaA^ >anzala {ll~ahu fiyhi waman l~amo yaHokum bimaA^ >anzala {ll~ahu fa>uw@la`^}ika humu {lofa`siquwna

name: Buck
text: wa>anzalonaA^ <ilayoka {lokita`ba bi{loHaq~i muSad~iqFA l~imaA bayona yadayohi mina {lokita`bi wamuhayominFA Ealayohi fa{Hokum bayonahum bimaA^ >anzala {ll~ahu walaA tat~abiEo >ahowaA^'ahumo Eam~aA jaA^'aka mina {loHaq~i likul~K jaEalonaA minkumo $iroEapF waminohaAjFA walawo $aA^'a {ll~ahu lajaEalakumo >um~apF wa`HidapF wala`kin l~iyaboluwakumo fiY maA^ 'aAtaY`kumo fa{sotabiquwA@ {loxayora`ti <ilaY {ll~ahi marojiEukumo jamiyEFA fayunab~i}ukum bimaA kuntumo fiyhi taxotalifuwna

name: Buck
text: wa>ani {Hokum bayonahum bimaA^ >anzala {ll~ahu walaA tat~abiEo >ahowaA^'ahumo wa{Ho*arohumo >an yafotinuwka Ean[ baEoDi maA^ >anzala {ll~ahu <ilayoka fa<in tawal~awoA@ fa{Eolamo >an~amaA yuriydu {ll~ahu >an yuSiybahum bibaEoDi *unuwbihimo wa<in~a kaviyrFA m~ina {ln~aAsi lafa`siquwna

text: >afaHukoma {loja`hiliy~api yaboguwna wamano >aHosanu mina {ll~ahi HukomFA l~iqawomK yuwqinuwna

text: ya`^>ay~uhaA {l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ laA tat~axi*uwA@ {loyahuwda wa{ln~aSa`raY`^ >awoliyaA^'a baEoDuhumo >awoliyaA^'u baEoDK waman yatawal~ahum m~inkumo fa<in~ahu, minohumo <in~a {ll~aha laA yahodiY {loqawoma {lZ~a`limiyna

text: fataraY {l~a*iyna fiY quluwbihim m~araDN yusa`riEuwna fiyhimo yaquwluwna naxo$aY`^ >an tuSiybanaA daA^}irapN faEasaY {ll~ahu >an ya>otiYa bi{lofatoHi >awo >amorK m~ino Eindihi. fayuSobiHuwA@ EalaY` maA^ >asar~uwA@ fiY^ >anfusihimo na`dimiyna

name: Buck
text: wayaquwlu {l~a*iyna 'aAmanuw^A@ >aha`^&ulaA^'i {l~a*iyna >aqosamuwA@ bi{ll~ahi jahoda >ayoma`nihimo <in~ahumo lamaEakumo HabiTato >aEoma`luhumo fa>aSobaHuwA@ xa`siriyna

name: Buck
text: ya`^>ay~uhaA {l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ man yarotad~a minkumo Ean diynihi. fasawofa ya>otiY {ll~ahu biqawomK yuHib~uhumo wayuHib~uwnahu,^ >a*il~apK EalaY {lomu&ominiyna >aEiz~apK EalaY {loka`firiyna yuja`hiduwna fiY sabiyli {ll~ahi walaA yaxaAfuwna lawomapa laA^}imK *a`lika faDolu {ll~ahi yu&otiyhi man ya$aA^'u wa{ll~ahu wa`siEN EaliymN

name: Buck
text: <in~amaA waliy~ukumu {ll~ahu warasuwluhu, wa{l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ {l~a*iyna yuqiymuwna {lS~alaw`pa wayu&otuwna {lz~akaw`pa wahumo ra`kiEuwna

name: Buck
text: waman yatawal~a {ll~aha warasuwlahu, wa{l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ fa<in~a Hizoba {ll~ahi humu {loga`libuwna

name: Buck
text: ya`^>ay~uhaA {l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ laA tat~axi*uwA@ {l~a*iyna {t~axa*uwA@ diynakumo huzuwFA walaEibFA m~ina {l~a*iyna >uwtuwA@ {lokita`ba min qabolikumo wa{lokuf~aAra >awoliyaA^'a wa{t~aquwA@ {ll~aha <in kuntum m~u&ominiyna

name: Buck
text: wa<i*aA naAdayotumo <ilaY {lS~alaw`pi {t~axa*uwhaA huzuwFA walaEibFA *a`lika bi>an~ahumo qawomN l~aA yaEoqiluwna

name: Buck
text: qulo ya`^>ahola {lokita`bi halo tanqimuwna min~aA^ <il~aA^ >ano 'aAman~aA bi{ll~ahi wamaA^ >unzila <ilayonaA wamaA^ >unzila min qabolu wa>an~a >akovarakumo fa`siquwna

name: Buck
text: qulo halo >unab~i}ukum bi$ar~K m~in *a`lika mavuwbapF Einda {ll~ahi man l~aEanahu {ll~ahu wagaDiba Ealayohi wajaEala minohumu {loqiradapa wa{loxanaAziyra waEabada {lT~a`guwta >uw@la`^}ika $ar~N m~akaAnFA wa>aDal~u Ean sawaA^'i {ls~abiyli

text: laA yu&aAxi*ukumu {ll~ahu bi{ll~agowi fiY^ >ayoma`nikumo wala`kin yu&aAxi*ukum bimaA Eaq~adt~umu {lo>ayoma`na fakaf~a`ratuhu,^ <iToEaAmu Ea$arapi masa`kiyna mino >awosaTi maA tuToEimuwna >aholiykumo >awo kisowatuhumo >awo taHoriyru raqabapK faman l~amo yajido faSiyaAmu vala`vapi >ay~aAmK *a`lika kaf~a`rapu >ayoma`nikumo <i*aA Halafotumo wa{HofaZuw^A@ >ayoma`nakumo ka*a`lika yubay~inu {ll~ahu lakumo 'aAya`tihi. laEal~akumo ta$okuruwna

text: ya`^>ay~uhaA {l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ layaboluwan~akumu {ll~ahu bi$aYo'K m~ina {lS~ayodi tanaAluhu,^ >ayodiykumo warimaAHukumo liyaEolama {ll~ahu man yaxaAfuhu, bi{logayobi famani {EotadaY` baEoda *a`lika falahu, Ea*aAbN >aliymN

text: <i*o qaAla {ll~ahu ya`EiysaY {bona maroyama {*okuro niEomatiY Ealayoka waEalaY` wa`lidatika <i*o >ay~adt~uka biruwHi {loqudusi tukal~imu {ln~aAsa fiY {lomahodi wakaholFA wa<i*o Eal~amotuka {lokita`ba wa{loHikomapa wa{lt~aworaY`pa wa{lo<injiyla wa<i*o taxoluqu mina {lT~iyni kahayo_#api {lT~ayori bi<i*oniY fatanfuxu fiyhaA fatakuwnu TayorF[A bi<i*oniY watubori}u {lo>akomaha wa{lo>aboraSa bi<i*oniY wa<i*o tuxoriju {lomawotaY` bi<i*oniY wa<i*o kafafotu baniY^ <isora`^'iyla Eanka <i*o ji}otahum bi{lobay~ina`ti faqaAla {l~a*iyna kafaruwA@ minohumo <ino ha`*aA^ <il~aA siHorN m~ubiynN

text: <i*o qaAla {loHawaAriy~uwna ya`EiysaY {bona maroyama halo yasotaTiyEu rab~uka >an yunaz~ila EalayonaA maA^}idapF m~ina {ls~amaA^'i qaAla {t~aquwA@ {ll~aha <in kuntum m~u&ominiyna

text: qaAluwA@ nuriydu >an n~a>okula minohaA wataToma}in~a quluwbunaA wanaEolama >an qado SadaqotanaA wanakuwna EalayohaA mina {l$~a`hidiyna

name: Buck
text: qaAla EiysaY {bonu maroyama {ll~ahum~a rab~anaA^ >anzilo EalayonaA maA^}idapF m~ina {ls~amaA^'i takuwnu lanaA EiydFA l~i>aw~alinaA wa'aAxirinaA wa'aAyapF m~inka wa{rozuqonaA wa>anta xayoru {lr~a`ziqiyna

name: Buck
text: qaAla {ll~ahu <in~iY munaz~iluhaA Ealayokumo faman yakofuro baEodu minkumo fa<in~iY^ >uEa*~ibuhu, Ea*aAbFA l~aA^ >uEa*~ibuhu,^ >aHadFA m~ina {loEa`lamiyna

name: Buck
text: wa<i*o qaAla {ll~ahu ya`EiysaY {bona maroyama 'a>anta qulota liln~aAsi {t~axi*uwniY wa>um~iYa <ila`hayoni min duwni {ll~ahi qaAla suboHa`naka maA yakuwnu liY^ >ano >aquwla maA layosa liY biHaq~K <in kuntu qulotuhu, faqado Ealimotahu, taEolamu maA fiY nafosiY walaA^ >aEolamu maA fiY nafosika <in~aka >anta Eal~a`mu {loguyuwbi

text: maA qulotu lahumo <il~aA maA^ >amarotaniY bihi.^ >ani {EobuduwA@ {ll~aha rab~iY warab~akumo wakuntu Ealayohimo $ahiydFA m~aA dumotu fiyhimo falam~aA tawaf~ayotaniY kunta >anta {lr~aqiyba Ealayohimo wa>anta EalaY` kul~i $aYo'K $ahiydN
